bibl.title: Witnesses of a 'Prayer of Offering' in Sahidic from the White Monastery and the Thebaid.
bibl.note: 1. BnF, Copte 12920 fol. 157 r. 8-v. 13. White Monastery, 10-11th century. - 2. O. Frangé 730. Thebaid, TT 29, 7-8th century. - 3. BM EA 14180. Provenance unknown (Upper Egypt?), 6-7th century.
bibl.seg: Ágnes Mihálykó Tothne, Witnesses of a 'Prayer of Offering' in Sahidic from the White Monastery and the Thebaid.
Journal of Coptic Studies 17 (2015) pp. 127-139, 1 fig.
1. BnF, Copte 12920 fol. 157 r. 8-v. 13. White Monastery, 10-11th century. - 2. O. Frangé 730. Thebaid, TT 29, 7-8th century. - 3. BM EA 14180. Provenance unknown (Upper Egypt?), 6-7th century.
